titleStmt.title: A companion for the penitent, and for persons troubled in mind consisting of an office for the penitent, to carry on their reconciliation with God, and a tryal or judgment of the soul, for discovering the safety of their spiritual estate, and an office for persons troubled in mind, to settle them in peace and comfort / by John Kettlewell ...
titleStmt.author: Kettlewell, John, 1653-1695.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Robert Kettlewell, and sold by Benj. Bragg ...,

notesStmt.note: Advertisement: prelim. p. [1] and p. [8]-[9] and end.
Pages at end bound out of order.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
